mapper.select:
WITH PAGE AS ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROWM, T1.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO ,UP_BOARD_NO ,INOUT_GBN ,TITLE ,CRT_BY ,READ_CNT ,FILE_PATH ,CRT_DTM FROM HP_BOARD WHERE NVL(DEL_YN ,'N') = 'N' AND BOARD_GBN = 'NOTICE'
AND INOUT_GBN = #{inoutGbn}
AND UPPER(TITLE) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#{searchTitle}) ||'%'
AND UPPER(TITLE) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#{searc hTitle2}) ||'%'
START WITH UP_BOARD_NO = '0' CONNECT BY PRIOR BOARD_NO = UP_BOARD_NO ORDER SIBLINGS BY BOARD_NO DESC ) T1 ) SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWM),0) AS TOT_CNT FROM PAGE T2

SELECT BOARD_NO , INOUT_GBN , UP_BOARD_NO , CRT_BY , CRT_DTM , READ_CNT , REPLACE(REPLACE(TITLE, '<', '<'), '>', '>') AS TITLE , CONTENT , FILE_PATH AS FILES , REPLACE(SUBSTR(FILE_PATH, 1, INSTR(FILE_PATH, ';', 1, 1) - 1), '\', '/') AS FILE_PATH , SUBSTR(SUBSTR(FILE_PATH, INSTR(FILE_PATH, ';', 1, 1) + 1), 1, LENGTH(SUBSTR(FILE_PATH, INSTR(FILE_PATH, ';', 1, 1) + 1)) - (LENGTH(FILE_PATH) - INSTR(FILE_PATH, ';', 1, 2) + 1)) AS FILE_ID , SUBSTR(FILE_PATH, INSTR(FILE_PATH, ';', 1, 2) + 1) AS FILE_NAME , (SELECT MAX(ROWNUM) FROM HP_BOARD HH WHERE HH.UP_BOARD_NO = A.BOARD_NO AND NVL(HH.DEL_YN, 'N') = 'N') AS UP_BOARD_NO_CNT FROM HP_BOARD A WHERE BOARD_GBN = 'NOTICE' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HP_BOARD( BOARD_NO ,INOUT_GBN ,BOARD_GBN ,EMP_ID ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,FILE_PATH ,URL ,UP_BOARD_NO ,DEPTH ,READ_CNT ,DEL_YN ,AC_IP ,CRT_BY ,CRT_DTM ) VALUES ( SEQ_HP_BOARD.NEXTVAL , #{inoutGbn} , 'NOTICE' , #{empId} , #{title} , #{content} , #{files} , #{url} , '0' , '0' , '0' , 'N' , #{acIp} , #{empId} , SYSDATE)
